body: these plot ok for me on master and 0.13. Can you retry and show the backtrace?

My apologies. It works fine in master and 0.13.0. I picked the system installed version of pandas since i was using fabric to run the test method.

This is what i see in 0.12:


Closing the issue.
